channel.title: Authors on ACloudLabs.Guru
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on ACloudLabs.Guru

item.description: Ansil has more than a decade of experience in different IT domains. He is an expert in DevOps.His skill set includes Linux, GCP, AWS, VMware, Nutanix, Rancher, Docker, Git, Python, Golang, Kubernetes, Istio, Prometheus, Grafana, ArgoCD, Jenkins, StackStorm and other CNCF projects.
